references: Amending: Ord 48022. Repealing: Ord 64567, Ord 88604, Ord 88738, Ord 90880, Ord 94348, Ord 95659, Ord 95179, Ord 101762, Ord 102354, Ord 106181, Ord 106884
summary: AN ORDINANCE repealing Sections 57, 58, 58A, 59, 60, 61, 62, and 63 of the License Code, (Ordinance 48022) and Ordinances 64567, 88604, 88738, 90880, 94348, 95659, 95197, 101762, 102354, 106181, and 106884, relating to the licensing and regulation of Cabarets.
